official_title: A bill to allow the Export-Import Bank to prepay obligations issued to the Federal Financing Bank without incurring prepayment penalties.
subjects: Export-Import Bank of the United States

summary.text: Allows the Export-Import Bank to prepay obligations issued to the Federal Financing Bank between November 30, 1982, and January 1, 1988, without incurring prepayment penalties.

titles.title: A bill to allow the Export-Import Bank to prepay obligations issued to the Federal Financing Bank without incurring prepayment penalties.
